name: PR Trade
description: A Slack bot for internal code review of pull requests

secret_key_base.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

default_owner.description: Github organization that is the default owner of traded repositories

review_label.description: Only pull requests labeled with this label will be fetched by the application as ready for review

bot_name.description: The name of the Slack bot that will post the suggestions for trade

usage_bot_name.description: The name of the Slack bot that will post the correct usage of the application

icon_emoji.description: Slack bot's avatar will be the emoji specified here

usage_icon_emoji.description: Slack bot's avatar will change to the one specified here when showing the correct usage of the application

error_icon_emoji.description: Slack bot's avatar will change to the one specified here when an error will occur

max_suggestions.description: The maximum number of suggestions that will be displayed

github_webhook_secret.description: This value has to match the secret for the webhook on Github.

slack_api_token.description: The token from the Slack webhook.
